Key Match Events: Adam Zampa led Australia's attack, taking four wickets in the team's vital win over Sri Lanka in Lucknow.
Australia chased 210 after bowling Sri Lanka out.
David Warner (11) and Steve Smith (0) fell in the same Dilshan Madushanka over.
Josh Inglis scored a career-best ODI knock of 58 from 59 balls.
Pat Cummins took 2 wickets for 32 runs.
Glenn Maxwell scored 31 runs from 21 balls.
Pat Cummins triggered a collapse by taking the breakthrough wicket of Pathum Nissanka.
Adam Zampa dismissed Kusal Mendis (9) and Sadeera Samarawickrama (8) in the space of two balls.
Post-Match Reflections: Adam Zampa played through back spasms in a five-wicket defeat of Sri Lanka.
Zampa mentioned he still had room for improvement once he returned to peak physical condition.
Sri Lanka has now lost its first three matches, facing an uphill battle to make it past the pool stage.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Some wild wind in Lucknow blew banners down from the roof of the stadium and into the crowd, delaying the start of the second innings as ground officials secured the area.
